pli-tv-pvr2.15:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-pvr2.15:1.1: When it comes to the offenses that are a result of consenting to physical contact, through how many of the seven principles for settling legal issues are they settled?
pli-tv-pvr2.15:1.3: they may be settled by resolution face-to-face and by acting according to what has been admitted; or they may be settled by resolution face-to-face and by covering over as if with grass. …
pli-tv-pvr2.15:2.1: When it comes to the offenses that are a result of asking for curd and then eating it, through how many of the seven principles for settling legal issues are they settled?
pli-tv-pvr2.15:2.3: they may be settled by resolution face-to-face and by acting according to what has been admitted; or they may be settled by resolution face-to-face and by covering over as if with grass.
pli-tv-pvr2.15:3.1: The seventh section on settling is finished.
